item.title: How to use CSI Volume Snapshotting with Velero
item.description: In the recent 1.4 release of Velero, we announced a new feature of supporting CSI snapshotting using the Kubernetes CSI Snapshot Beta APIs. With this capability of CSI volume snapshotting, Velero can now support any volume provider that has a CSI driver with snapshotting capability, without requiring a Velero-specific volume snapshotter plugin to be available. This post has the necessary instructions for you to start using this feature. Getting Started Using the CSI volume snapshotting features in Velero involves the following steps.
